Explore Exclusive Dating with Elixr

At Elixr, we believe age should not hinder anyone from forming new friendships and relationships in life. We built Elixr, after witnessing our loved ones go through the stigma and loneliness that comes with aging and retirement. Learn how Elixr is helping older adults create meaningful connections

Elixr was designed for comfort, our user guide walks you through the process of creating a fantastic profile

Meeting strangers for the first time may be challenging at first, but having these safety tips might make it easy for you to feel more comfortable. Meet at a public location and ensure you tell someone you’re going on a date, finally, refrain from giving full personal details

You can be rest assured that your personal details are safe with us. We run on a strict policy that ensures everyone is verified before coming on our platform, you can read our privacy policy to learn more.

A diamond experience on Elixr gives you access to In-built video call system, ability to switch to another location, and the chance to see who has seen your profile.

If you're worried about starting a conversation with a new person,choose an activity you both enjoy. Ask your date what they would like to do, that way it will be a lot less intimidating, this familiar environment will enable you be yourself.

Elixir is an exclusive social web platform that allows older adults socialize with people with similar interests values and ages.
